column2: Annex a country of small size and population by conquest
Own all Portuguese and Brazilian cores directly or through puppets to form Portugal-Brazil and get Portuguese/Brazilian as an accepted pop
What it says on the tin
Estonians and Latvians are really just very confused Germans
We shall embrace our Czech citizens, and elevate them to the status shared by that of the Hungarians.
Turn on the function to change the National Value.
Turn off the function to change the National Value.

The foreigners progress and dominate through an orderly and organized society, based on a sense of duty to their country. If we were to embrace this ideal, we might strive as they do.

§YThe modifiers for this NV are:§W
§GLand and Naval Organization: +10%
Land and Naval Units Starting Experience: +0.10
Organization Regain Rate: +5%
Mobilization Size: +5%§W
§RMobilization Impact on Economy: +75%
Pops will be slightly more conservative.§W

The foreigners progress through an industrious society based on hard work. If we were to embrace this ideal, we might progress as they do.

§YThe modifiers for this NV are:§W
§GTax Efficiency: +10%
Factory, RGO and Artisan Throughput: +5%
Commerce Tech Research Bonus: 5%
Mobilization Size: +4%§W
§RMobilization Impact on Economy: +50%§W

The foreigners progress through a society based on strong leadership, obedience and loyalty. If we were to embrace this ideal, we might progress as they do.

§YThe modifiers for this NV are:§W
§GRuling Party Support: +25%§W
§RSocial and Political Reform Desire: -5%
Literacy Impact on Consciousness: -10%§W
§GMobilization Size: +4.5%§W
§RMobilization Impact on Economy: +100%
Pops will be more conservative and will be more inclined to adopt the current government (fascist, communist, anarcho-liberal) ideology.§W

It is time for our nation to change the character of our people, to encourage them to embrace the values of equality and social fairness above all else.

§YThe modifiers for this NV are:§W
§GAssimilation Rate: +10%
Social Reform Desire: +5%
Immigrant Attract: +5%
Pop Militancy: -0.01
Culture Tech Research Bonus: 5%
Mobilization Size: +3.5%§W
§RMobilization Impact on Economy: +110%
Pops will be slightly more socialist.§W

It is time for our nation to change the character of our people, to encourage them to embrace the values of liberty and personal freedom above all else.

§YThe modifiers for this NV are:§W
§GPolitical Reform Desire: +5%
Immigrant Attraction: +5%
Commerce Tech Research Bonus: 5%
Mobilization Size: +3.5%§W

Pops will be slightly more liberal.§W
